thread.title: The Tampa Bay Lightning Hilariously Burn The Chargers Over New Logo On Twitter
thread.title_full: The Tampa Bay Lightning Hilariously Burn The Chargers Over New Logo On Twitter

author: Jorge Alonso
title: The Tampa Bay Lightning Hilariously Burn The Chargers Over New Logo On Twitter

organizations.name: tampa bay lightning hilariously burn the chargers

text:
On Thursday the San Diego Chargers announced they were moving to Los Angeles. Along with that announcement they revealed their new logo.
The Los Angeles @Chargers ⚡️ pic.twitter.com/bJmv4LcPME 
— NFL (@NFL) January 12, 2017 

Plenty of people around the Internet mocked the Chargers’ ridiculous new logo but the best Tweet of the day came from the Tampa Bay Lightning. 
*checks mentions*
*squints*
*clears throat*
for the record, us & the @dodgers are just friends https://t.co/jBoJhZlYVD 
— Tampa Bay Lightning (@TBLightning) January 12, 2017 
. @TBLightning @Dodgers give your social media coordinator a raise right now.
— Karisa Maxwell (@KarisaMaxwell) January 12, 2017 


. @nick_pants @TBLightning @Dodgers pic.twitter.com/pEDxPZ3Llc 
— Hector Diaz (@iamHectorDiaz) January 12, 2017 
sure you are, @TBLightning @Dodgers pic.twitter.com/16B9RGSScI 
— Hector Diaz (@iamHectorDiaz) January 12, 2017 


@TBLightning @NFL @Chargers Uhhh…… @Dodgers #LA pic.twitter.com/GK87ME6gEi 
— Jerry Hairston, Jr. (@TheRealJHair) January 12, 2017 
. @TBLightning …
Cc: @dodgers @Chargers #Chargers pic.twitter.com/XGjPJWZDjC 
— Jimmy Mack (@jcmack03) January 12, 2017 
@TBLightning @Dodgers pic.twitter.com/5hJvIBMjKa 
— スーパコーパイタリア本田 (@HollywoodAsia) January 12, 2017
